articles.title: Biden files investigation will overshadow White House - BBC
articles.description: The distinctions between the inquiry into Mr Biden and a parallel one into Donald Trump may pass most Americans by.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: Biden says documents weren't sitting out on the street
At times, Joe Biden is his own worst enemy.

articles.author: Sean Boynton
articles.title: North American semiconductor industry will prevent 'over-reliance' on Asia: Trudeau - National | Globalnews.ca - Global News
articles.description: Canada, the U.S. and Mexico agreed this week to boost semiconductor output and investment in the continent to compete with Asia, which has dominated the industry.
